definitions.definition: A robbery or burglary , especially from an institution such as a bank or museum .
A fiction genre in which a heist is central to the plot ; a work in such a genre.

main_definition: A robbery or burglary , especially from an institution such as a bank or museum .
secondary_definitions: ( countable , uncountable ) A fiction genre in which a heist is central to the plot ; a work in such a genre.
